import React from "react"; import "./Card.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Cookies from "universal-cookie"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const Card = () => { const [card, setCard] = useState([]); const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0); const cookies = new Cookies(); var userEmail = cookies.get("email"); var cardDetails = cookies.get("card") === undefined ? [] : cookies.get("card").split("|"); setCard(cardDetails) const onDeletefromCard = (item) => { console.log("dfgdf"); var cardCookies = cookies.get("card").split("|"); console.log(cardCookies); }; return (
Shopping cart

You have {cardDetails.length} items in your cart Total Price : {totalPrice} €
{cardDetails.map((item) => (
       
{item.split(",")[1]} {item.split(",")[4]} , {item.split(",")[3]}
{/* {formatDate(new Date(item.card.CardDate))}{" "} */}     {" "}   {item.split(",")[7]}   x   {item.split(",")[5]}   =   {item.split(",")[7] * item.split(",")[5]}  €       { onDeletefromCard(item); }} icon={faTrash} size="1x" />
))}
)}
